title: Anne-Marie Trevelyan – 2022 Comments on the Dismissal of Kwasi Kwarteng
author: admin
summary: The comments by Anne-Marie Trevelyan, the Secretary of State for Transport, on Twitter on 14 October 2022.
content:
This Government will continue to deliver in the National Interest. To #GetBritainMoving & grow our economy, we’ve accelerated more than 100 infrastructure projects across the country. Working closely with Jeremy Hunt will continue to get shovels in the ground.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
